original_text: Then ye answered and said unto me, We have sinned against the Lord, we will go up and fight, according to all that the Lord our God commanded us. And when ye had girded on every man his weapons of war, ye were ready to go up into the hill.
korean_text: 너희가 대답하여 내게 이르기를 우리가 여호와께 범죄하였사오니 우리 하나님께서 우리에게 명령하신 대로 우리가 올라가서 싸우리이다 하고 너희가 각각 무기를 가지고 경솔히 산지로 올라가려 할 때에

sentences.original_text: Then ye answered and said unto me
We have sinned against the Lord
we will go up and fight
according to all that the Lord our God commanded us
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 하나님 주께서 우리에게 명하신 모든 것대로

sentences.original_text: And when ye had girded on every man his weapons of war
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희가 각각 전쟁 무기를 채웠을 때

sentences.original_text: ye were ready to go up into the hill
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 그 산으로 올라갈 준비가 되었더라
